name: UFO puzzle packing!
description:
A little puzzle game made for Mini Jam 91

At the moment there is no sound.

there are some known bugs!

  • It's possible to pick up multiple blocks sometimes
  • Sometimes the game thinks you're holding fish when you aren't
  • Mouse and touch controls weirdly offset

Note: The browser version of the game reflects the latest build. To play the jam build download the desktop verison

The goal of the game is to fill up each box as much as possible until you reach your quota. Filling a box perfectly will result in 2x the normal amount of points gained. If you leave fish outside of the box when shipping, you'll lose hearts. Run out of hearts and you need to restart the level.

For every perfecly packed box, you will be rewarded 1 star. Stars are needed to unlock levels

Controls

ArrowsMove cursorX/V
SelectZ/CSummon next fish/Back

Mouse control is supported
To reset save data press Z/C and Up on the title screen
